Video Conferencing






Home  »     »  Video Conferencing		









Video Conferencing



	 With upgraded state-of-art technology in all locations, NIC provides one of the largest High Definition Video Conferencing Network in the country.

	 It is offering VC services since 1995, that are being used for monitoring various Government Projects, Schemes, Public Grievances, Monitoring of Law and Order, Hearings of RTI cases, Distance Education, Tele-Medicine, monitoring of Election processes, Launching of new schemes and more.

	 NIC-VC Services seamlessly integrate with laptops, desktops, tablets, smart phones, room systems and legacy equipment. NIC’s VC services are regularly being used by Hon’ble President of India, Hon’ble Prime Minister, Chief Ministers of various states, Cabinet Secretary and Chief Secretaries, Chief Information Commissioner, Central and State Government Ministers and Department Officials across country at all levels. 

	 NIC has various studios for videoconferencing including NIC Studio and Departmental Studios in different states and each state has multiple studios available for videoconferencing. Each state has VC Coordinators who conducts the videoconferencing by managing the connecting sites, network connectivity in the MCU during VC session. 
For more details please visit :  https://vidcon.nic.in/index.html
